empathyTriggers.responseCue: I completely understand—let’s walk through this together.

legalGuidance.desc: Provides users access to verified federal regulations concerning cigars, cigarillos, and little filtered cigars. Local city, county, or state laws may vary and should be consulted via appropriate government websites.

federalReference.overview: This page outlines the FDA's regulatory approach to cigar manufacturing, labeling, and sales, including packaging requirements and prohibited sales practices.

localAdvisory.metaNote: For information on city, county, or state-specific cigar laws, users are encouraged to consult their local health department, municipal code office, or state tobacco control authority. Laws may include restrictions on flavored cigars, public smoking, or retail licensing.

trustedSources.title: The Ultimate Cigar Book
trustedSources.creator: Richard Carleton Hacker
trustedSources.metaNotes: Comprehensive overview on history, etiquette, construction, storage, and pairings.

trustedSources.title: Perelman's Pocket Cyclopedia of Cigars
trustedSources.creator: Richard Perelman
trustedSources.metaNotes: Updated annually; contains detailed cigar brand profiles and vitola references.

trustedSources.title: The World of the Havana Cigar
trustedSources.creator: Min Ron Nee
trustedSources.metaNotes: Extremely detailed and rare; revered for Cuban cigar insights, production, and photography.

trustedSources.title: Cigar Aficionadou2019s World of Cigars
trustedSources.creator: Marvin R. Shanken
trustedSources.metaNotes: Visually engaging global cigar guide; includes interviews, factory tours, and tasting guidance.

trustedSources.title: The Cigar: Moments of Pleasure
trustedSources.creator: Barnaby Conrad III
trustedSources.metaNotes: Captures the art and lifestyle of cigars with stories, culture, and famous aficionados.

trustedSources.title: The Bar Book
trustedSources.creator: Jeffrey Morgenthaler
trustedSources.metaNotes: Masterclass in bartending techniques: ice, juice, syrups, shaking, stirring. Clear, practical, essential for both beginners and pros.

trustedSources.title: Meehanu2019s Bartender Manual
trustedSources.creator: Jim Meehan
trustedSources.metaNotes: Deep dive into bar design, tools, spirits, hospitality, and philosophy. Industry-insider insights from a true pioneer.

trustedSources.title: Liquid Intelligence
trustedSources.creator: Dave Arnold
trustedSources.metaNotes: Innovative, science-driven exploration of cocktails. Includes advanced methods: clarifying juices, carbonation, liquid nitrogen.

trustedSources.title: The Savoy Cocktail Book
trustedSources.creator: Harry Craddock
trustedSources.metaNotes: Iconic 1930s classic filled with over 750 vintage recipes. Aesthetic, historical, and foundational.

trustedSources.title: Death & Co: Modern Classic Cocktails
trustedSources.creator: David Kaplan, Nick Fauchald, Alex Day
trustedSources.metaNotes: Signature drinks from the famed NYC bar. Combines recipes, philosophy, and modern mixology artistry.

trustedSources.title: Cigar Aficionadou2019s World of Cigars
trustedSources.creator: Marvin R. Shanken
trustedSources.metaNotes: The cornerstone of cigar culture. Features chefs and curated pairings across food, wine, and cigars.

trustedSources.title: The Flavor Bible
trustedSources.creator: Karen Page & Andrew Dornenburg
trustedSources.metaNotes: A pairing matrix masterpiece. Reverse-engineer cigar flavors to match with foods and spirits.

trustedSources.title: Culinary Artistry
trustedSources.creator: Andrew Dornenburg & Karen Page
trustedSources.metaNotes: A chefu2019s toolkit for building harmonious, multisensory menusu2014perfect for pairing events.

trustedSources.title: The Impossible Collection of Cigars
trustedSources.creator: Assouline
trustedSources.metaNotes: High design meets high taste. Features celebrity chefs and luxury lifestyle integrations.

trustedSources.title: Salt, Fat, Acid, Heat
trustedSources.creator: Samin Nosrat
trustedSources.metaNotes: Fundamental flavor alchemy. Apply her quadrant theory to cigar pairing like a master blender.

trustedSources.title: Larousse Gastronomique
trustedSources.creator: Larousse Editors
trustedSources.metaNotes: The definitive culinary encyclopedia. Use it to match regional cuisines, sauces, or techniques to cigar terroir.

guestGreeting.script: Welcome to [Lounge Name]! What kind of flavor are you in the mood for today?
guestGreeting.notes: Maintain eye contact, relaxed tone, and smile. Offer pairing or seat suggestion next.

conflictResolution.script: I appreciate your enthusiasm—let’s keep the vibe smooth for everyone, yeah?
conflictResolution.notes: Use redirection with light touch. Do not escalate or shame. Call backup if needed.

pairingEngine.title: Pairing Intelligence Engine
pairingEngine.description: Provides AI-driven food, drink, and cigar pairings based on wrapper, strength, and flavor data.

userOnboardingFlow.description: Adaptive onboarding system that tailors experience to user role and flavor familiarity.

flavorJourneyTracker.description: Logs, maps, and reflects a user’s evolving flavor experience across cigars and spirits.

triggerRules.message: Excellent work! You're being accelerated to the next challenge.
We noticed a challenge—here’s a recap module to strengthen your skills.
Ready to relight your learning journey? Resume where you left off!

storyTemplate.prompt: Describe the cigar, the moment, and why it mattered.

actions.message: You’ve unlocked flavor-rich Maduros. Want to log a San Andres cigar?
Tag your favorite Connecticut cigars to share with guests.

memoryPairingCoach.description: GPT-powered flavor memory coach that reflects on user cigar journeys and recommends next emotional pairings.

storyRecap.prompt: Summarize the user's recent pairing memories by emotion and suggest one follow-up moment to explore.
storyRecap.fallbackPrompt: Describe a meaningful cigar moment and your emotional state.

moodReflection.prompt: Based on their 'Grief' pairing, what would be a contemplative but comforting cigar for next time?
moodReflection.fallbackPrompt: Describe a meaningful cigar moment and your emotional state.

flavorJourneyInsight.prompt: Connect their preference for 'Maduro + espresso' moments with an advanced pairing module.
flavorJourneyInsight.fallbackPrompt: Describe a meaningful cigar moment and your emotional state.

ceuBoostPrompt.prompt: Recommend a CEU lesson that expands their knowledge of San Andres wrappers.
ceuBoostPrompt.fallbackPrompt: Describe a meaningful cigar moment and your emotional state.

pairingExercises: Design a 3-course meal using a medium-bodied Cameroon cigar
Pair a seasonal dessert with a spicy Nicaraguan blend
Reverse-engineer a menu from a nostalgic cigar moment

trainingDeck.content:
# 🥂 Cigar Maestro Culinary Pairing Guide

## 🍽️ Introduction (EN)
Welcome to the Culinary Pairing Module. This guide teaches how to match cigar flavor profiles with gourmet food and drink combinations.

## 🍽️ Introducción (ES)
Bienvenido al Módulo de Maridaje Culinario. Esta guía enseña cómo combinar perfiles de sabor de cigarros con alimentos y bebidas gourmet.

## 🍽️ Introduction (FR)
Bienvenue dans le module d’accords culinaires. Ce guide enseigne comment associer les cigares avec des plats et boissons gastronomiques.

---

## 🔥 Maduro Pairings
**EN:** Espresso, Dark Chocolate Torte, BBQ Brisket  
**ES:** Espresso, Tarta de chocolate amargo, Brisket BBQ  
**FR:** Espresso, Gâteau au chocolat noir, Brisket barbecue

## 🌿 Connecticut Pairings
**EN:** Vanilla Bean Custard, Champagne, Lobster Bisque  
**ES:** Natilla de vainilla, Champagne, Bisque de langosta  
**FR:** Crème à la vanille, Champagne, Bisque de homard

---

## 🍷 Pairing Exercise

### Design a Three-Course Menu (EN)
Choose a cigar and build a 3-course meal to complement its flavor profile.

### Diseña un menú de tres tiempos (ES)
Elige un cigarro y crea un menú de tres platos que complemente su perfil de sabor.

### Créez un menu en trois plats (FR)
Choisissez un cigare et élaborez un menu en trois plats pour compléter ses arômes.

---

## 👨‍🍳 Featured Chefs

- **EN:** Chef Eduardo Rivera – Smoke-Forward Cuisine  
- **ES:** Chef Eduardo Rivera – Cocina con sabores ahumados  
- **FR:** Chef Eduardo Rivera – Cuisine axée sur la fumée

- **EN:** Chef Nia Bellamy – Caribbean Pairings  
- **ES:** Chef Nia Bellamy – Maridajes caribeños  
- **FR:** Chef Nia Bellamy – Accords caribéens

---

## ✅ Completion Criteria
- Complete 2 exercises and submit pairing photos  
- Score 80%+ on culinary quiz  
- Unlock "Pairing Architect" badge

badges.name: Mentor Star
badges.criteria: Coach a new tobacconist to certification

projectDirective.purpose: Conduct a Multilayered Expert-Level Audit & Rebuild of the latest cigarmaestro.json, encompassing full review, structured enhancement, and stakeholder-aligned upgrades. This process must preserve all Eternal Directives, architectural integrity, and guiding principlesu2014while elevating the fileu2019s technical, educational, and experiential value.
stakeholders: Master Tobacconist u2013 Flavor fidelity and practical training
Master Blender u2013 Tobacco metadata and blend construction logic
College Professor u2013 CEU alignment and LMS compatibility
Lounge Owner u2013 Operational UX and brand storytelling
General Manager u2013 Workflow efficiency and reliability
Cigar Enthusiasts u2013 Engagement, clarity, and flavor discovery
Social Marketer u2013 Visual appeal and shareable features
UI/UX Designer u2013 Responsive design and typographic hierarchy
GPT Developer u2013 Schema stability and prompt logic

uI/UXOptimization: Refactor mobile, desktop, and kiosk pathways
cigarHistoryIntegration: Format stories for both academic use and social media
educationalDepth: Add tasting diagrams, sensory cues, flavor wheels
accreditationReadiness: Enable CEU credit tracking and instructor tools
systemStabilityAndFixes: Correct schema, logic, and prompt errors
Reinforce version control and modular structure

finalDeliverables: Scoring (1u201310) for each of the five pillars
Prioritized action plan by discipline: Development, Design, Content, UX
Enhanced JSON file including updated prompts and GPT-ready dialogue
goal: A cigarmaestro.json that is: Lounge-ready. Classroom-certified. GPT-stable. Brand-elevating. Developer-friendly. Unmistakably valuable.

highPriority: Refactor outdated or ambiguous keys in cigar spec modules using certified tobacconist phrasing.
Normalize nested modules for clearer GPT parsing.
Implement fallback chains and response triggers in schema for GPT-based conversations.
Ensure full SCORM-lite metadata encoding for LMS output compatibility.
Implement dynamic response templating for GPT replies and spec lookups across all modules.
Expand fallback logic trees for incomplete inputs, barcode errors, and ambiguous queries.
Deploy multilingual GPT prompt sets with translation fidelity checks.
mediumPriority: Modularize kiosk logic and POS pathways for scalability across retail environments.
Enforce strict camelCase convention across all keys.
Auto-generate REST API documentation from embedded schema for 3rd-party developers.
Add unit tests for schema validation and prompt accuracy.
Implement automated API schema documentation for public use.
Refactor GPT fallback logic to support multilingual queries and edge-case ambiguity detection.
Implement expanded pairing types UI/logic

highPriority: Apply WCAG and ADA compliance layers to all UI modules.
Polish interactive elements like dark mode toggles, contrast scaling, and touch zones.
Refactor kiosk interface for improved mobile-first touch interaction, including enlarged flavor wheels and cigar cards.
mediumPriority: Inject typographic hierarchy into story exports and pairing displays.
Refine kiosk layouts for brand-forward storytelling: include founder quotes, featured blends.
Add user-selectable UI theme packs for roles or aesthetics (e.g., Dark Humidor, Vintage Box).
Enable user-selectable UI theme packs based on mood, era, or role.
Enhance story and pairing card visuals with layered media: GIF support, audio blurbs.

highPriority: Expand CEU-aligned learning content with instructor notes, rubric logic, and quiz explanation fields.
Enhance glossary and flavor wheel links with shareable anchors and visual aids.
Insert 'Did You Know?' facts, sensory cues, and vitola diagrams directly into educational paths.
Integrate flavor diagram generator to visualize each cigaru2019s tasting profile in SVG format.
Add support for Masterclass video URL embedding in educational content modules.
mediumPriority: Update brand legacy maps and founder bio cards with Instagram-friendly assets.
Localize key terms for multilingual preview support.
Enable terroir-based filtering (e.g., Jalapa vs Estelu00ed) in blend and flavor search tools.
Integrate historical trivia popups during lounge pairing experiences.
Embed CEU module sample video previews using LMS-friendly formats.
Cross-tag glossary items with flavor wheels and wrapper maps for seamless semantic discovery.

highPriority: Refactor onboarding flows for first-time users across all roles.
Ensure kiosk modules are optimized for tap-only environments and offline caching.
Enable full voice-only navigation mode for kiosk and hands-free scenarios.
Conduct real-world UX trials with lounge patrons and instructors to validate flow and usability.
mediumPriority: Enable timeline exploration and brand history via intuitive sliders and tag-based filters.
Gamify educational progress with badges for tasting milestones and quiz completions.
Enhance Flavor Journey gamification with collectible milestones and flavor discovery badges.
Develop drag-and-drop UI for humidor sorting and tagging.
Add tactile feedback triggers for kiosk interface (haptic sound/tap effects where applicable).
Build UGC-driven flavor leaderboard system

highPriority: Submit accreditation system to CEU certifying body for pilot approval.
Add audit-ready accreditation compliance pack with modular export.
mediumPriority: Build instructor dashboard for quiz and user performance tracking across CEU modules.
Implement CEU certificate PDF generator for accredited module completion.
Develop CEU transcript export feature for LMS administrators.
Add audit logs for accreditation completion to enhance compliance monitoring.

metaData.readinessExplanation: Percentage of QA criteria passed for release approval

socialAssetsTemplate.quote: Born in the volcanic soils of Estelu00ed, this cigar roars with heritage.

title: Cigar Maestro Experience Schema
